```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
library(tidyverse)
library(rvest)
library(ggthemes)
library(janitor)
library(dplyr)
```

```{r conversion, echo = FALSE}
table <- read_csv(file = "United_States_COVID-19_Cases_and_Deaths_by_State_over_Time.csv", show_col_types = FALSE)
```

```{r graphing, echo = FALSE}
table |>
  select(tot_cases, prob_cases) |>
  drop_na(prob_cases) |>
  drop_na(tot_cases) |>
  ggplot(aes(x = tot_cases, y = tot_cases)) +
  geom_point(size = 0.25) + 
  labs(title = "Actual Cases vs Projected Cases", subtitle = "The predictions are extremely accurate", x = "Projected Cases", y = "Actual Cases", caption = "Source: CDC")
```
